title: Minimizing biological sludge generation in a sidestream enhanced biological phosphorus removal (S2EBPR) system: full-scale evaluation and modeling insights
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00115J, Paper
Raffaele Morello, Francesco Di Capua, McKenna Farmer, Patrick Dunlap, Cindy Dongqi Qin, Joseph Kozak, Danilo Spasiano, Fabrizio Sabba
This study evaluated sewage sludge production in real-scale and modelled side-stream enhanced biological phosphorus removal (S2EBPR) systems under various mixing, organic feeding, and solids retention time (SRT) conditions. The S2EBPR...
